title: jeremypwr
author: jeremypwr
content: UFC Fight Night 225Multi Master Challenge   Prizes1st place: 3 mbtc Free Bet2nd place: 2 mbtc Free Bet3rd place: 1 mbtc Free BetThe Rules are similar to the original Sportsbet.io Multi Master that we all enjoyed so muchRulesa)  Predict the winner of each match (earn 1-2 points)b)  Predict how many matches will NOT go the Full Distance (will be adjusted accordingly if matches get cancelled)Odds @ https://sportsbet.io/sports/mma/ufc/ufc-fight-night-holloway-vs-the-korean-zombie/matchesMatches(2 points each)13. Max Holloway vs. Jung Chan-sung12. Anthony Smith vs. Ryan Spann11. Giga Chikadze vs. Alex Caceres10. Rinya Nakamura vs. Fernie Garcia9. Erin Blanchfield vs. Taila Santos8. Junior Tafa vs. Parker Porter(1 point each)7. Waldo Cortes-Acosta vs. Łukasz Brzeski6. Toshiomi Kazama vs. Garrett Armfield5. Chidi Njokuani vs. Michał Oleksiejczuk4. Song Kenan vs. Rolando Bedoya3. Billy Goff vs. Yusaku Kinoshita2. Liang Na vs. JJ Aldrich1. Choi Seung-woo vs. Jarno ErrensNOT go the Full Distance   Make sure your Prediction is in this format    Example13. Max Holloway 12. Anthony Smith 11. Giga Chikadze 10. Rinya Nakamura 9. Erin Blanchfield 8. Junior Tafa 7. Waldo Cortes-Acosta 6. Toshiomi Kazama 5. Chidi Njokuani 4. Song Kenan 3. Billy Goff 2. Liang Na 1. Choi Seung-woo NOT go the Full Distance 10

comments.author: jeremypwr
comments.body: Sportsbet.io has been kind enough to sponsor my Prediction Contests and Promos for a while now.Sportsbet.io is a sports betting website; therefore these Prediction Contests and Promos are catered to those who actually bet on/discuss sports.Given the nature of my threads, please do not bother making a Prediction if you have not read the OP and qualify.If you are unsure if you qualify, just shoot me a PM.  Thank you for your cooperation.
